alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 26 at 3:31PM CDT until October 27 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT /3 AM MDT/ FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ SATURDAY TO 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of light snow and freezing drizzle tonight with 2 to 4 inches of snow expected Saturday. * WHERE...Cherry county. * WHEN...The freezing drizzle and light snow is expected this evening. The snow Saturday will begin before or shortly after sunrise Saturday and end late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult due to accumulations of ice and snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice accumulations of a few hundreths of an inch and snowfall of up to 1/2 inch is expected this evening.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.
